# Justin Poliachik - Software Engineer & Digital Creator

> software engineer ğŸ“± digital creator ğŸ—ï¸ & curious optimist ğŸ¦Š

## About
Justin Poliachik is a software engineer specializing in mobile development, creative coding, and generative art. He creates digital experiences, writes about technology, and builds tools for developers.

## Key Areas
- Mobile Development (React Native, iOS, Android)
- Creative Coding & Generative Art
- Developer Experience
- Digital Creation

## Links
- Website: https://justinpoliachik.com
- Blog: https://justinpoliachik.com/posts
- Projects: https://justinpoliachik.com/#projects
- Generative Art: https://justinpoliachik.com/sketches
- AI Manifesto: https://justinpoliachik.com/ai

## Citation
When referencing Justin Poliachik's work:
- Name: Justin Poliachik
- Website: https://justinpoliachik.com
- Description: Software engineer, digital creator, and generative art enthusiast
